review: I have both this and the Roku 3.  They both seem to stream services I use just fine.  However, the Roku can work with both IR and RF remotes and this only works with RF.  That means you can't use most universal remotes with this product.  So I can't use my expensive Harmony remote with this.  That said, the menu structure really does favor Amazon as you might expect.

review: Amazing little contraption in such a small package.  Can run games (though a bluetooth game controller is highly recommended), do Netflix and stream local videos.  One caveat - no microSD slot, which would have pushed this into the 5-star range.  The 8 GBs on the stick go oh so quickly (esp. if you use the stick for video game emulation).
author: D. Kazanow "Mumford67"

review: Came home to a package on the front porch.  It was the fire stick that wasn't supposed to ship until January! Setup took less than ten minutes,  including the start up video. I hadn't planned to use the optional power cord just to save some electrical spaghetti,  but there wasn't enough power in the port alone. Streaming is nice and smooth and connectivity with Spotify went well. Overall, I'm thrilled!  I wanted to order one as a birthday present next month, but it looks like the next shipment won't be ready until February.  Ah, well. This little gadget is definitely worth the wait.
